stanza.line: Against my love shall be as I amnow
With Time injurious hand crushed andoerworn
When hours have drained his blood and filled hisbrow
With lines and wrinkles when his youthfulmorn
Hath travelled on to age steepynight
And all those beauties whereof now heking
Are vanishing or vanished out ofsight
Stealing away the treasure of hisspring
For such a time do I now fortify
That he shall never cut from memory
My sweet love beauty though my loverlife
His beauty shall in these black lines beseen
And they shall live and he in them stillgreen
